ops.js: showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:10}); // “Yes, that was how it got started.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:12}); // “I couldn't figure it out either.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:15}); // “I was being summoned by Sephiroth.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // “All the anger and hatred I bore him,
made it impossible for me to ever forget him.
That and what he gave me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:17}); // “Sephiroth? Sephiroth?
I'm here.
And I brought you the Black Materia.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:18}); // “Show yourself to me.
Where are you?”
fadeScreen({r:12, g:40, b:40, speed:40, type:30}); // unused=0

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:19}); // “Sephiroth…
So we finally meet again.”
fadeScreen({r:12, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:30}); // unused=0

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Hojo
“…He's a Sephiroth-clone I created
after the real Sephiroth died five years ago.”{PAUSE}“Jenova cells and Mako, with my
knowledge and skills, have been
combined with science and nature
to bring him to life.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // Hojo
“…I'm not wild about the failure
part, but the Jenova Reunion Theory
has now been proven.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // Hojo
“You see, even if Jenova's body is dismembered,
it will eventually become one again.
That's what is meant by Jenova's Reunion.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Hojo
“I have been waiting for the Reunion to start.
Five years have passed, and now the clones
have begun to return.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Hojo
“I thought the clones would begin
to gather at Midgar
where Jenova is stored.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // “But my predictions were not entirely correct.
Jenova itself began to move away
from the Shinra Building.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // Hojo
“But being the genius that I am,
I soon figured it out.
You see it was all Sephiroth's doing.”{PAUSE}“Sephiroth is not just content
to diffuse his will
into the Lifestream. He wants
to manipulate the Clones himself.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // Hojo
“I wondered where the clones were going,
but I was never able to figure it out.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // Hojo
“The one thing that I did know was that
Sephiroth was at their final destination.”

dialogStrings:
Hojo
“…He's a Sephiroth-clone I created
after the real Sephiroth died five years ago.”{PAUSE}“Jenova cells and Mako, with my
knowledge and skills, have been
combined with science and nature
to bring him to life.”

Hojo
“…I'm not wild about the failure
part, but the Jenova Reunion Theory
has now been proven.”

Hojo
“You see, even if Jenova's body is dismembered,
it will eventually become one again.
That's what is meant by Jenova's Reunion.”

Hojo
“I have been waiting for the Reunion to start.
Five years have passed, and now the clones
have begun to return.”

Hojo
“I thought the clones would begin
to gather at Midgar
where Jenova is stored.”

“But my predictions were not entirely correct.
Jenova itself began to move away
from the Shinra Building.”

Hojo
“But being the genius that I am,
I soon figured it out.
You see it was all Sephiroth's doing.”{PAUSE}“Sephiroth is not just content
to diffuse his will
into the Lifestream. He wants
to manipulate the Clones himself.”
“Yes, that was how it got started.”

Hojo
“I wondered where the clones were going,
but I was never able to figure it out.”

Hojo
“The one thing that I did know was that
Sephiroth was at their final destination.”

“All the anger and hatred I bore him,
made it impossible for me to ever forget him.
That and what he gave me.”

“Sephiroth? Sephiroth?
I'm here.
And I brought you the Black Materia.”

“Show yourself to me.
Where are you?”
